thread.title: Disney Doodle: The Blue Fairy Brings Main Street, U.S.A. Windows To Life
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: The Blue Fairy Brings Main Street, U.S.A. Windows To Life

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: The Blue Fairy Brings Main Street, U.S.A. Windows To Life
text:
Today’s Disney Doodle takes a look at what the Blue Fairy from “ Pinocchio ” may do if she visited a Disney Park . In the film, she’s remembered for bringing Pinocchio to life as a “real boy” after proving himself “brave, truthful and unselfish.” So there’s no doubt she’d flex her wish-granting skills to similar lifelike figures at Magic Kingdom Park .
“The window displays on Main Street are so magical,” said artist Ashley Taylor. “It’s easy to imagine the Blue Fairy being able to bring them to life!”
